SELECT u.`nickname` as `nickname`, u.`face` as `userFace`, ic.`sepc_name` as `specName`, ic.`content` as `content`, ic.`created_time` as createdTime, ic.`comment_level` as `commentLevel` FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN `user` u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) as price FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like "%"#{paramsMap.keywords}"%"
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts DESC
tempSpec.price ASC
i.item_name ASC

i.sell_counts DESC
tempSpec.price ASC
i.item_name ASC
